name: AN_IO_MARK_AS_FINAL
description: This table contains Anesthesia's post-op input/output (I/O) navigator mark as final data.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Episode.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AN_IO_FIN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of the Anesthesia I/O (Intake / Output) navigator section being marked as final.

columns.name: AN_IO_FIN_USER_ID
columns.description: User that marked the Anesthesia I/O (Intake / Output) navigator section as final.

columns.name: AN_IO_FIN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AN_IO_FIN_INTAKE
columns.description: Intake total at the point of marking Anesthesia I/O (Intake / Output) section as final.

columns.name: AN_IO_FIN_OUTPUT
columns.description: Output total at the point of marking Anesthesia I/O (Intake / Output) navigator section as final.
